metadata:profiles:convert.description: Converts full profiles into json or xml format.
examples:
sfdx metadata:profiles:convert -f json -i force-app/main/default/profiles -o force-app/main/default/test
        //Converts full profiles into json or xml, !!!! does not split !!!!.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

examples:
sfdx metadata:profiles:merge -i force-app/main/default/profiles -o force-app/main/default/test
        //Merges profiles located in specified input dir and copies them into the output dir.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

input.name: input
input.description: the input directory where the splitted profiles exist.

output.name: output
output.description: the output directory to store the full profiles.

delete.name: delete
delete.description: Delete the splitted profiles once merged?

examples:
sfdx metadata:profiles:split -i force-app/main/default/profiles -o force-app/main/default/test
        //Splits profiles located in specified input dir and copies them into the output dir.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

input.name: input
input.description: the input directory where the full profiles exist.

output.name: output
output.description: the output directory to store the chunked profiles.

delete.name: delete
delete.description: Delete the existing profiles once converted?
